restaurant.name: Tasty Delights
restaurant.description: A cozy restaurant serving delicious dishes.

menu.name: Burger
menu.description: A classic beef patty served in a soft bun, topped with fresh lettuce, juicy tomato slices, melted cheese, and a touch of tangy ketchup. Allergens: Dairy (cheese).

menu.name: Salad
menu.description: A refreshing medley of crisp lettuce, colorful vegetables, and a zesty vinaigrette dressing. Topped with croutons for added crunch. Allergens: Gluten (croutons).

menu.name: Ice Cream
menu.description: Creamy and indulgent, our ice cream is a delightful treat made with rich dairy, churned to perfection. Available in various flavors to satisfy your cravings. Allergens: Dairy.

menu.name: Steak
menu.description: A succulent cut of perfectly grilled steak, seasoned to perfection and served with your choice of sides. Allergens: None.

menu.name: Mozzarella Sticks
menu.description: Crispy and cheesy mozzarella sticks, served with a tangy marinara sauce for dipping. Allergens: Dairy.

menu.name: Cheesecake
menu.description: Indulge in our velvety smooth cheesecake, topped with a drizzle of fruit sauce. Allergens: Dairy, Gluten (crust).
